general.no-data: Error loading data. Please refresh the page or try again later.
general.expiration-text-1: Your list will be deleted after the expiration date.
general.maintenance: Please try again later. Available in:
general.product-list-replace: Are you sure you want to import this product list? This will replace your current product list.

about.text1: The main goal of this project is to enable the search of product prices in online stores and save them for future comparison and analysis.
about.text2: Product data is collected automatically and may contain errors or inconsistencies. If you find any, please contact us.
about.text3: This project is non-commercial and is not affiliated with any company or organization. It is open-source and can be used by anyone.

privacy-terms.text1: This website only collects anonymized data for analytics purposes.
privacy-terms.text2: It does not collect, store, or use any personal data, and does not use cookies or any other tracking technologies that can be used to identify its users.
privacy-terms.delete-local-data-text: This will delete all the data stored locally on your device, including product lists. This action cannot be undone.

product-titles.price-indicator-info: Green - Price lower than the average price. Orange - Price equal to the average price. Red - Price higher than the average price.

error.product-outdated: The product price information is outdated, please try again later.
